thread.title: Rowdy youths block Raila, Kalonzo convoy in Meru town - PHOTOS - Nairobi News
thread.title_full: Rowdy youths block Raila, Kalonzo convoy in Meru town - PHOTOS - Nairobi News

title: Rowdy youths block Raila, Kalonzo convoy in Meru town - PHOTOS - Nairobi News
text:
Rowdy youths block Raila, Kalonzo convoy in Meru town – PHOTOS Posted on Feb 27, 2017 250 Views Stones were placed on the road leading to the matatu terminal in Meru on February 27, 2017. PHOTO | DAVID MUCHUI By DAVID MUCHUI 
Rowdy youths opposed to the National Super Alliance on Monday blocked the convoy of Raila Odinga and Kalonzo Musyoka from entering the main matatu terminal in Meru town. ODM leader Raila Odinga arrives at Timau stadium in Buuri sub-county on February 27 2017. PHOTO | PHOEBE OKALL 
The youths used stones to barricade the road leading to the terminal where the two leaders were scheduled to address a crowd. ODM leader Raila Odinga addresses a crowd at Timau matatu stage during his first day of his tour in Meru county on February 27 2017. PHOTO | PHOEBE OKALL 
The two principals were forced to avoid the venue. 
Mr Odinga and Mr Musyoka are on a two-day tour of Mount Kenya East with stopovers in Maua, Laare, Timau and Meru town in Meru county as well as Tharaka-Nithi’s Kathwana and Marimanti, among others.
